summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackNUDESTIX NUDESKIN Gentle Hydra-Gel Face Cleanser is a non-foaming clean water gel that removes natural makeup, clarifies skin tone and gently cleans skin impurities without harsh surfactants, fragrances and chemicals.
details: DetailsBenefitsNon-foaming water gel that removes light makeup, clarifies & gently cleans skin impurities, soothing sensitive skinSulfate-free, hypoallergenic formula developed and with powered actives for all skin typesKey IngredientsSkin Cleanser: Bergamot Fruit Oil has antiseptic and antibacterial benefits to deep clean pores and helps reduce the appearance of blemishes. Gentle sulfate-free cleansing gel for sensitive skin.Skin Softener: Hyaluronic Acid to soften and moisturize skin. Humectants keep skin hydrated.Skin Brightener: Natural AHAs gently exfoliate and brighten skin. Mushroom extracts to brighten skin. Cicer Seed Extract brightens to improve skin tone.Formulated WithoutParabensSulfatesPhthalatesGlutenSynthetic fragranceItem 2571977How To UseUse daily, morning and night.Massage on dry or wet skin to wash skin and remove light makeup, then wash off with water for clean, fresh and soft skin.Follow with Nudeskin 5% Citrus Fruit and Glycolic Glow Toner and Nudeskin Citrus-C Mask & Daily Moisturizer.IngredientsWater, Dipropylene Glycol, PEG-6 Caprylic/Capric Glycerides, Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Butylene Glycol, Carbomer, Propanediol, Tromethamine, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Tricholoma Matsutake Extract, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Hydrolyzed Cicer Seed Extract, Rhododendron Chrysanthum Leaf Extract, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, *Limonene, *Linalool*Naturally occurring in essential oils listed.Nudestix formulations are updated from time to time as part of our commitment to innovation and maintaining global compliance. Therefore, ingredient lists or claims shown here may differ from the box of the product depending on time and global region of purchase.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

reviews.headline: I like it but tiny amount for money
reviews.comments: I've been using this cleaner as part of my AM routine for a year and I really like how gentle and hydrating it is! My skin is sensitive, prone to eczema and redness and this kept that at bay! My issue is that the tube and amount is so tiny! I have to buy every two months. I'm looking at other gel moisturizing cleansers but would use this again if they updated the packaging.

reviews.headline: Not bad but strange
reviews.comments: This did not irritate my sensitive skin. It is lightly fragranced. My skin feels a little tight several minutes after washing, buti normally use a hydrating cleanser. The gel texture is really strange and I had to use a lot more product than I'm used to. It felt like I was massaging hair gel into my face. No foaming. Rinses off ok.

reviews.headline: Hate love relationship
reviews.comments: I have a hate love relationship with this product the only thing that was so confusing is that it does not lather at all but it does clean my face feels so soft and very very clean will buy again but I was very confused that it did not lather since it was a cleanserï¿¼

reviews.headline: I'm on my 4th tube and plan to buy more!
reviews.comments: I use this product in the shower to wash my face. I've found it doesn't remove makeup very well, especially mascara. You might want to use a makeup remover first, then cleanse with this gel. Because it doesn't lather, it just takes a little getting used-to -- getting the "serving size" right, and massaging it into the skin for long enough to effectively lift oils. But, it works really well. It does not leave a residue behind after I've rinsed it off. I love how light it is, and the fragrance is pleasant while using -- no lingering fragrance. While it is pretty expensive for the amount you receive, it's the best cleanser I've used in a while, so for me it is worth the splurge!

reviews.headline: Love this cleanser
reviews.comments: I have dry skin and absolutely love this cleanser! My face doesn't feel stripped and love how gentle it feels! Wish they had a bigger size tube!

media.headline: love love and love this product
media.caption: My daily cleanser

media.headline: Great staple for your everyday skincare routine
media.caption:
I receieved this product from BzzAgent in exchange for my honest review. I hadn't tried any NudeStix skin care prior to recieving this product. I have been using it for the past week, and I love how it makes my face feel. I am able to cleanse my face and take off my daily makeup all in one step. I like that it also doesn't dry out my skin or leave my face to oily after using. A lot of cleansers that take off makeup tend to leave an oily residue which I absolutely hate but this one didn't do that! Because of the hydra-gel consistency it left my face feeling hydrated and clean after use! I used it in combination with the rest of my skin care routine and on its own and both ways my skin was left feeling hydrated and clean. I did not get a dry/tight feeling that some cleansers leave! I will definitely be incorporating this product into my everyday skin care routine going forward.

#productreview #productreviewer #pr #gifted #freeproduct #producttester #recievedforfree #skincare #skinhealth

faceoff_positive.comments:
I got this sample just in time for a wedding weekend, which involved several events requiring professional makeup application. I'm not someone who usually wears makeup, so I was pretty concerned about how I'd get all the STUFF off of my face! I have really sensitive skin, which usually breaks out after wearing too much makeup, so I'd resigned myself to having an itchy red face post-wedding (as long as the wedding pictures looked good though, right?).

At the end of day one of wedding festivities, I was desperate to have my makeup-free face backâ¦ enter NudeStix to the rescue!

I only needed a small (pea sized) amount to see results! The makeup came off without issue, while leaving a lovely scent behind - not too strong, but definitely refreshing. I did a second wash (mostly because of my own paranoia of sleeping with makeup on), and my face felt clean, without feeling dehydrated. 

Needless to say, I used this cleanser all weekend. The best surprise - I had no post-makeup breakouts (I don't know if it was the NudeStix, but I'm willing to believe it helped).

Notes: 
Though the packaging says safe for eyes, I used a different product to remove my eye makeup (my paranoia again). 

I wish there was an exfoliating component in this product, but I've just been using this in tandem with my natural exfoliator.

All in all, definitely something I would recommend, and absolutely a product I'd make sure to have with me for makeup removal purposes :)
faceoff_positive.headline: Great for removing wedding makeup!

faceoff_negative.comments: I really love foaming cleansers as I feel like they clean my skin the best... that being said, I know that some people find foaming cleansers can be drying. This specific nudestix cleanser doesn't foam whatsoever... not even a little bit... so it is definitely gentle. You can definitely have a gentle cleanser that actually *cleans the skin* but this one does not... therefore I would not recommend :/ It just kind of feels like the same consistency of hand sanitizer if that makes sense, just a gel that you move around on your skin lol
faceoff_negative.headline: Doesn't really cleanse...
